pages.text: Different ores can be found in specific biomes at varying depths below sea level.
Aquite: Found in Swamps, between X1 to X2 blocks below sea level.
Diopside: Found in Swamps, between X1 to X2 blocks below sea level.
Pyrope: Found in Swamps, between X1 to X2 blocks below sea level.
Charoite: Found in Swamps, between X1 to X2 blocks below sea level.
Moonstone: Found in Swamps, between X1 to X2 blocks below sea level.
Falsite: Found in Swamps, between X1 to X2 blocks below sea level.
Ventium: Found in Swamps, between X1 to X2 blocks below sea level.
